title: Linnify Module Options Schema
description: Create a module corresponding to the Linnify styleguide

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the NgModule?

path.description: The path at which to create the NgModule, relative to the workspace root.

routingScope.description: The scope for the new routing module.

route.description: The route path for a lazy-loaded module. When supplied, creates a component in the new module, and adds the route to that component in the `Routes` array declared in the module provided in the `--module` option.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project root.

lintFix.description: Apply lint fixes after generating the module.

components.description: Whether the components directory should be create in the module or not

containers.description: Whether the containers directory should be create in the module or not

directives.description: Whether the directives directory should be create in the module or not

guards.description: Whether the guards directory should be create in the module or not

pipes.description: Whether the pipes directory should be create in the module or not

services.description: Whether the services directory should be create in the module or not

repositories.description: Whether the repositories directory should be create in the module or not

types.description: Whether the types directory should be create in the module or not
